BR_text.BRsummary: AC: Classify still go through for data with missing feature column
BR_text.BRdescription:
In the documentation (<denchmark-link:https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/api/generated/turicreate.activity_classifier.ActivityClassifier.classify.html#turicreate.activity_classifier.ActivityClassifier.classify>https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/api/generated/turicreate.activity_classifier.ActivityClassifier.classify.html#turicreate.activity_classifier.ActivityClassifier.classify</denchmark-link>
 )
 it mentions that the data must include columns with the same names as the features and session id used for model training.
 However, when running
 <denchmark-code>model = tc.activity_classifier.create(data,session_id='exp_id',target='activity',
 	max_iterations=3,prediction_window=prediction_window)
 
 print('\n==classify with missing feature==')
 missing_data = data.copy()
 del missing_data['acc_x']
 pred = model.classify(missing_data)
 </denchmark-code>
 
 It still go through without error out hmmmm.
 And I observe the same issue for 5.8, so I don't know it is meant to behave like this or not.
